title: Ground News - Jessica Pegula tells why Saudi-backed LIV-style tennis tour is 'inevitable'
text:
Summary by Ground News Jessica Pegula says Saudi-backed LIV-style tennis tour is 'inevitable' Pegula: 'They have infinite amounts of money and they seem to have been involved in every single sport in the world except for ours' Taylor Fritz: 'I think the biggest question mark is going to be, if you compete on that tour,. if you still are going to play slams or not' Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Tennis World Other: Tennis World Network Jessica Pegula tells why Saudi-backed LIV-style tennis tour is 'inevitable' Jessica Pegula thinks it is just a matter of time before a LIV-style tennis tour happens in tennis. In 2021, Saudi Arabia got into the golf world after it launched their own LIV Golf series. After some of the biggest golf names transitioned to the LIV tour, the PGA softened its stance and agreed to merge with the LIV tour. Over the last couple of months, there have been rumors indicating that Saudi Arabia may be looking to create a LIV-style t…
